name: Sandbox 31
description:
Ludum Dare 31: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=preview&uid=34391

The universe in a cube.
Requires Leap Motion

Here's my interpretation of the theme, The Entire Game (Universe) in One Screen (Cube). You are some omnipotent being who creates a universe from the big bang in our limited 3 dimensions. Everything exists inside the cube, there is nothing beyond it.

There's no real gameplay mechanics, just poke stuff and see what happens.

Tools:

  • Unity3D
  • Leap Motion
  • sfxr
  • Audacity
